mapper.select: SELECT ORDR_NO, RSC_CODE, FN_GET_CODE_NAME(RSC_CODE) AS RSC_NAME, FN_GET_RSC_PRC(RSC_CODE) AS RSC_PRC, RSC_CNT, ORDE_DATE, IST_REQ_DATE, '' DEF_CODE, FN_GET_RSC_UNIT(RSC_CODE) AS RSC_UNIT FROM RESOURCE_ORDER WHERE RSC_ST = '발주' ORDER BY ORDR_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESOURCE_IST_CHECK(RSC_TST_NO, ORDR_NO, RSC_IST_CNT, RSC_TST_CNT, RSC_PASS_CNT, RSC_DEF_CNT, TST_FLAG) VALUES(F_CODE_MAKER('RC'), #{ordrNo}, #{rscIstCnt}, #{rscTstCnt}, #{rscPassCnt}, NVL(#{rscDefCnt},0), 'Y')

INSERT INTO RESOURCE_RTNGD (RTNGD_NO, RSC_TST_NO, RSC_CODE, RTNGD_CNT, DEF_CODE, RTNGD_DATE) SELECT F_CODE_MAKER('RT'), RSC_TST_NO, #{rscCode}, RSC_DEF_CNT, #{defCode}, SYSDATE FROM RESOURCE_IST_CHECK WHERE ORDR_NO = #{ordrNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CODE AS DEF_CODE, CODE_NAME AS DEF_NAME FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE LIKE '%' || 'D_R' || '%'
